name: part_010
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY2】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony CREATORS' STAGE【チラ見せ】 [wCblx1C_j68]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Odo' by Usada Pekora, Kureiji Ollie, and Shiranui Flare.
Transition between performances on the main stage.
Performance of 'Bishoujo Muzai♡Pirates' featuring Houshou Marine, Hakui Koyori, Anya Melfissa, and Vestia Zeta.
